title: How to write a letter to someone you don't know well - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m writing to you because____________ 2. I am Sara from book club 3. I heard you wanted information on 4. I hope you don’t think it’s presumptuous of me to be contacting you 5. If you have any specific questions, don’t hesitate to contact me. 6. Looking forward to seeing you when the ladies get together again - or when the family meets at Thanksgiving - or whatever applies. 7. Sincerely,

May i know why you want to write a letter to this person? Standard procedure is knowing the whereabouts of the recipient. But since you hardly know the person then start by introducing yourself and state your reason for writing the letter.
